invocations.description: Draws an icon from WindBot with id iconid at position x: x, y: y. The value zoom is used to resize the icon, if you pass it as 100, it will draw without any resizing, 50 will draw it with 50% the size, and so on. Optionally you can set the fillcolor for the icon aswell its shadow color and depth.
invocations.exDescription: Draw a white pointer icon indicating where the simulated mouse cursor is.
